attributes.action: Compulsory Annual Fitness Bleep test for Members Of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Recent introduction of Police Compulsory Fitness Bleep testing should naturally extend to the governing bodies the Houses Of Parliament in the order of Transparency and Equality. I offer to extend the Government's own introduction to incorporate the Members Of Parliament.
